text: Feds arrest Don Lemon, Minnesota journalist and two others over church protest - NPR
fullText: Lemon was arrested by U.S. agents days after covering an anti-ICE protest at a St. Paul church. U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi called the protest a "coordinated attack."

text: Tesla throws in the towel on car sales - The Verge
